titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Board of Trustees Records, 1861-2014
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Clarke June 2007.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Vassar College Board of Trustees Records

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Materials relating to the work of the Vassar College Board of Trustees. Includes meeting minutes, reports, correspondence, committee records, and financial records.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The members of the first Board of Trustees were listed in the college charter, which was passed by the New York State Legislature January 18, 1861. The first meeting of the Board occurred five weeks later on February 26th.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of materials relating to the work of the Vassar College Board of Trustees. Includes meeting minutes, reports, correspondence, committee records, and financial records.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Records from roughly 1986 to the present (including all materials in boxes 24-34, 40-46, and 48-55) are currently closed to research. The rest of the collection is open for research with permission of the office of origin and in accordance with the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

odd.head: Encoding Information
odd.p: Encoded by Elizabeth Clarke, June 2007. Updated by Laura Streett, March 2009. Last updated by Emma Gronbeck, September 2025.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Original processing date unknown. Updated by Laura Streett, July 2011, by Mark Seidl, December 2019, and by Emma Gronbeck, November 2022, October 2023, January 2025, and September 2025.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Some materials (in boxes 29-34, 53, 56-58) were transferred from the Office of the Vice President for Finance in 2007 and 2025 (A2007-046, A2025-018).
Materials from the Trustee Committee on Buildings and Grounds in boxes 48-51 were transferred in 2007 and 2009. (A2007-047, A2009-014)

altformavail.head: Other Formats
altformavail.p: Some minutes have been digitized and are searchable through a database. However, direct access to the database is restricted to the Special Collections staff. Please contact the staff for further information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Board of Trustees Records, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

scopecontent.p: The Secretary's Files are divided into three subseries. The first set is arranged alphabetically and dates primarily from the 1940s. The second set is arranged alphabetically and dates from 1977 to 1989, and includes minutes, reports, agendas and some correspondence relating to regular meetings of the Board as well as its committees. The last set is minutes of the Executive Committee of the Board of Trustees and is arranged chronologically.
